feed.title: What happens after we "run out" of script flags?

entry.title: What happens after we "run out" of script flags?
entry.summary: The discussion emphasizes the premature nature of considering activation protocols at this stage. It dismisses concerns regarding the availability or limitation of script flags for those working on a soft fork proposal. The underlying message suggests that focusing on such specifics might be less relevant or unnecessary during the early phases of development, highlighting a broader perspective on priorities and focal points in the process.
